attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the UK Crane (Lifting) Industry from being Self regulating.
To go down this route is absolutely disastrous and completely foolhardy in respect of safety to all construction and crane associated personnel.
The lifting industry must answer to a government licensed department.

rejection.details: Your title (currently Terry Duxbury (UCOA)) should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
